name: Mystic Magic
description:
The mythological creatures have gone mad! Something has taken over their mind. Each mythical creature wants to rule another area that doesn’t belong to them. It is your job to get to them in time before they leave to scout for more places to rule. By defeating them, whatever had gotten into them will soon start to wear off, leaving them not knowing what they were supposed to do.

  • WASD to move
  • Space to jump
  • Left click to attack
  • Right click to use fireball (only at full mana)
  • Q to dash

You can swing horizontally and vertically. Swinging downward on enemies gives you a vertical boost, as well as a horizontal boost in the direction you are headed. If you aren't moving horizontally, you just move upward.

The mushroom is your mana display. When it is fully grown, you can use a fireball. You have to hit enemies 3 times to fill it up.

Fully killing enemies fills up a bar on the right. Once it's full, you take one damage, and it empties.
